author: Opinion by Joe Lockhart
title: Trump's Covid-19 reelection strategy
description: Joe Lockhart writes that by looking over the last two months, it is clear is that President Trump and his team have had a sophisticated reelection strategy when it came to dealing with the fast spreading Covid-19 pandemic.
content:
Joe Lockhart was White House press secretary from 1998-2000 in President Bill Clinton's administration. He co-hosts the podcast "Words Matter." The opinions expressed in this commentary are his own. View more opinion at CNN.
